data.actual_result: The slider can be moved and shows the Save Changes option, but nothing is saved due to lacking permissions.
data.expected_result: You cannot drag the slider because you do not have permission to manage channels.
data.short_description: You can drag the slowmode slider on channels where you don't have Manage Channels permission
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you are lacking manage channels in all, or only some channels. - Go to the channel settings for a channel where you have manage permissions, but not manage channel. - Observe the slider.
